name: Evil is Back (itch)
description:
• CAMERA: First-person.
  • CONTROL: Mouse and Keyboard only.
  • GRAPHICS: Triple-b game, graphics inspired by 80's horror movies.
  • DURATION: It depends a lot on the type of player, but it's not very long (30 to 60 minutes).
HAND OR CHAINSAW?

Without a doubt the best part of every "Evil Dead" movie is when "Ash Williams" loses his hand and uses a chainsaw instead. We decided to be as faithful as possible to the original work.
